When it comes to steam I will buy it. Im picky. Not a steam fanboy but I already have 110 games on it.

When I try to open it, a box pops up that says, "You have signed out of your Beamdog player, please sign in and try again." After I close that box, another box pops up saying, "Application corrupt." Help?

Guys,
Here's a fix for you:

I had same issue when trying to start the game (first asked for openal32.dll and after installing it still had problems).
The problem was that I had OpenAL installed already, so I went to CP and uninstalled it from the system, rebooted, installed it again and voila!, game works fine now.
You don't have to copy openal32.dll in BG folder.
Kratsss: thanks now it works, like it should.
I have the same issue as nAsylum... anyone know a solution?
Thank you kratsss. Your link fixed my no sound problem!

Installed, copied the crack that was provided, was getting the openal.dll error - Followed 'Kratssss' instructions & installed openAL - Now when I go to open the exe - Nothing happens. No error Message. Nothing. Ive tried rebooting, running as Admin, etc.

Any ideas?
a

I figured out my problem. I right clicked the exe > properties > forced compatiblity mode for windows 7, and to force always run as admin.

So basically, I forced it to open.. how it should open anyway, since im on windows 7 + admin.

No idea why that fixed it. but it did. 

(along with installing openAL)

Guys, I have a very strange problem with this game. 

It seems to work properly but when the first cinematic shows up it freezes. The only way to proceed is by skipping it by a double-click. Then again - everything seems to work, I can create a character and so on but when the actual game is supposed to start it crashes to desktop. I tried reinstalling the game and even downloaded it from a different torrent but every time I have exactly the same problem. 

Please, help me. I've been waiting for this game for months.

I am glad that TPB exists because otherwise I would be playing sollitaire all the time, so this isn't me looking into gifted horses mouth, merely technical curiosity.

For people complaint no sound, this is because two openal driver is missing. OpenAL32.dll and wrap_oal.dll. Just copy these two file to the game folder from other game folder, for example from :Mass EffectBinaries.
Thanks kratsss game works fine all i did was download open it and bang good game with sound first try!!

How to fix crash at startup.

Located the error to be widescreen often !

Go to documents and select the baldurs gate folder

Edit the

INSERT INTO options ROWS (
	'Window',	'Full Screen',	'1',

to

INSERT INTO options ROWS (
	'Window',	'Full Screen',	'0',

WORKS, but no full screen. Maybee when you starts, you might be able to switch
